name: Descending (Ludum Dare 50 submission)
description:
Try to save the people on the island. Seawater erodes the island's soil, but you can fill in the gaps and add more land on top. The island's dive is getting faster and faster, and you see that you are just delaying the inevitable.

Ludum Dare 50 Submission

  • Game page on ldjam.com

Controls:

  • Use left mouse button to add more soil to walk.

Assets:

  • All code is created during the Ludum Dare 50 Jam days
  • Used graphics by Pixel Frog

Team:

  • One-man team
